p: Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.
q: Qiyana swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element.
w: Qiyana dashes to a location and enchants her weapon with an element. Her attacks and abilities deal bonus damage while her weapon is enchanted.
e: Qiyana dashes to an enemy, damaging them.
r: Qiyana sends out a shockwave that detonates whatever elements she hits with it, stunning and damaging nearby enemies.
